Welcome to my Bespoke Presentation!

What is Bespoke?

  • Bespoke is a very lightweight presentation framework made using Javascript.
  • It was created in 2012 by Mark Dalgleish.

How easy is it?

I am using it right now!

There is a complicated setup, but the code is extremely easy to use once it is done.

Setup

First, install Node.js on your machine if you do not already have it.

Node.js is a JavaScript environment that runs locally in your machine. It is entirely configured and used in the Terminal.

You can find it at nodejs.org

Setup

Download the source for the automatic Bespoke Builder

Find it at github.com/bespokejs/generator-bespoke

Truth be told, I am not entirely sure this was a necessary step, as Node will asynchronously pull files for you, but I did it anyway just to be sure.

Warning!

I had an issue with Node's ability to actually write files to my computer at this point. my computer had not actually given it permission to write anything.

Fix

To fix this, follow these instructions

Find out where node is located by entering this command into terminal

npm config get prefix

Fix

To fix this, follow these instructions

If the folder that comes up is "/usr/local" then enter this command:

sudo chown -R 'yourUserName' '/usr/local'

Just the beginning...


  • Edit Jade markup in 'src/index.jade'
  • Edit Stylus styles in 'src/styles/main.styl'
  • Edit JavaScript in 'src/scripts/main.js'

  • Enjoy! :) -@markdalgleish
